page.title: 09Craft
page.content: In a Thatched cottage at Sanham Green a husband and wife team have a bookbinding business. This started from their love and collection of old books, after taking an early retirement. They attended courses over many weeks at a College to learn the art of bookbinding. Work is carried out in a shed situated in the garden.They have two presses,tools and varying leathers.Books are repaired in leather tooled in gold leaf. A local wildlife artist started her career at the age of thirty six,with no formal training and what was a hobby has now become a thriving business. Her paintings for which she uses a water based paint called gouache are used to illustrate cards and calendars.
